record.id: field.name="alert2" and file.name="category" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: alert2
record.file.name: category

brief.brief: The time interval from the time an Incident reaches the first alert stage to the time that Incident should reach the second alert stage, if it remains unresolved.
In order to default to this alert, fill in this field using the interval format (ddd hh:mm:ss).
If this field is empty (NULL), the alert2.expression field does not set an interval to schedule an alert2. It sets the next alert level instead.
If the alert1.expression field is blank, Service Manager bases the time interval on the open or update time rather than the Alert stage 1 time.
